mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_SEQ, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, BASE_ITEM, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, THUMBNAIL_NAME, CONTENT, INCLUDE_LIGHT, INCLUDE_GRILL, RENT_TYPE, WDATE, DEL) VALUES(PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{product_Name}, #{product_Desc}, #{base_Item}, #{product_Price}, #{product_Stock}, #{thumbnail_Name}, #{content}, #{include_Light}, #{include_Grill}, #{rent_Type}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select:
SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, BASE_ITEM, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, THUMBNAIL_NAME, CONTENT, INCLUDE_LIGHT, INCLUDE_GRILL, RENT_TYPE, WDATE, DEL, (SELECT NVL(AVG(RATE), 0) FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_SEQ = P.PRODUCT_SEQ) AS RATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY
WDATE DESC
PRODUCT_NAME ASC
PRODUCT_PRICE ASC
PRODUCT_PRICE DESC
) AS RNUM, PRODUCT_SEQ, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, BASE_ITEM, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, THUMBNAIL_NAME, CONTENT, INCLUDE_LIGHT, INCLUDE_GRILL, RENT_TYPE, WDATE, DEL FROM PRODUCT WHERE DEL = 0
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
) P WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY
WDATE DESC
PRODUCT_NAME ASC
PRODUCT_PRICE ASC
PRODUCT_PRICE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE DEL = 0
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_RENT WHERE RENT_TYPE = (SELECT RENT_TYPE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_Seq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_REVIEW (REVIEW_SEQ, PRODUCT_SEQ, USER_ID, ORDER_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, IMAGE, RATE, WDATE, DEL, STATUS) VALUES(PRODUCT_REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ FROM PRODUCT_ORDER WHERE ORDER_SEQ=#{order_Seq}), #{user_Id}, #{order_Seq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_SEQ, PRODUCT_SEQ, USER_ID, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = USER_ID) AS NICKNAME, ORDER_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, IMAGE, RATE, WDATE, DEL, STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY WDATE DESC) AS RNUM, REVIEW_SEQ, PRODUCT_SEQ, USER_ID, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = USER_ID) AS NICKNAME, ORDER_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, IMAGE, RATE, WDATE, DEL, STATUS FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW WHERE DEL = 0 AND PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_Seq} ORDER BY WDATE ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW WHERE 1=1 AND DEL != 1 AND PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_Seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_QNA (QNA_SEQ, PRODUCT_SEQ, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, SECRET, DEL, STATUS, REF, STEP) VALUES(PRODUCT_QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{product_Seq}, #{user_Id}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{secret}, 0, 0, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF),0) FROM PRODUCT_QNA) + 1, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT QNA_SEQ, PRODUCT_SEQ, USER_ID, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = USER_ID) AS NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, SECRET, DEL, STATUS, REF, STEP, NVL(( SELECT CONTENT FROM PRODUCT_QNA WHERE REF = P.REF AND STEP = 1 ),0)AS ANSWERCONTENT, ( SELECT WDATE FROM PRODUCT_QNA WHERE REF = P.REF AND STEP = 1 ) AS ANSWERWDATE FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY WDATE DESC) AS RNUM, QNA_SEQ, PRODUCT_SEQ, USER_ID, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = USER_ID) AS NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, SECRET, DEL, STATUS, REF, STEP FROM PRODUCT_QNA WHERE PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_Seq} AND DEL = 0 AND STEP = 0 ORDER BY WDATE DESC, REF DESC ) P WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_QNA WHERE 1=1 AND DEL = 0 AND STEP = 0 AND PRODUCT_SEQ = #{product_Seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_ORDER (ORDER_SEQ, USER_ID, ORDER_DATE, PRODUCT_SEQ, OPTION1_SEQ, OPTION2_SEQ, QUANTITY, RENT_SEQ, RENT_SDATE, RENT_EDATE, PRODUCT_PRICE, SHIPPING_FEE, TOTAL_PRICE, RECEIVER, ADDRESS, RECEIVER_PHONE, MEMO, PAYMENT, MERCHANT_UID, ORDER_STATUS, REVIEW_STATUS) VALUES (PRODUCT_ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_Id}, SYSDATE, #{product_Seq}, #{option1_Seq}, #{option2_Seq}, #{quantity}, #{rent_Seq}, #{rent_Sdate}, #{rent_Edate}, #{product_Price}, #{shipping_Fee}, #{total_Price}, #{receiver}, #{address}, #{receiver_Phone}, #{memo}, #{payment}, #{merchant_Uid}, 1, 0)
